content: beginner size about 74 x 18 in 188 x 45 cm materials lion brand® mandala bonus bundle® art # 125 # 266h golem 1 ball a crochet hook size j 6 mm needle set gauge 3 series of *2 double_crochet 2 chs 2 double_crochet skip 3 sts* + 6 row = about 3 5 in 9 5 cm abbreviations beg = begin ninig chain = chain repeat = repeat round s = round s single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet= double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch st s = stitch es skip = skip
